about_the_game:
Ollie, kickflip and grind through the endless pixel crafted world of Mreowfield. Make your way past the pug patrol and any others that stand in the way of skateboarding. Use collected Tacos along the way as the only defense between that 360 flip to 5-0 grind and bailing.

Dr. Tacocat was designed to be a cute and fun game to be played 10-20 minutes here and there; While you wait for the squad to ready up or to fill in between rounds during a stream. Procedurally generated levels keep it fresh. Start anytime, stop anytime.

Key Features

  • Generous infinite runner. Control the level speed with a push of the board.
  • Forgiving falls - Bail on a trick or stopped by a civilian do gooder? Bounce back into place and keep on shredding!
  • 'Realistic' Trick animations. Ollie, 8 flip tricks, 4 different grinds and 4 different grabs
  • Motivation keeps you going. Land big combos to keep the motivation bar up while falls decrease the amount.
  • Nothing to prove. No classes, no gated content, no progression system. All the tricks from the very beginning.

The four zones of Mreowfield

  • The empty boardwalk where you can hone in the skills,
  • Out in suburbia where the pugs' patrol and neighbors try to keep you off their lawn.
  • Somewhere in the city. It's late but the stairs spot are plentiful.
  • On the rooftops. Don't look down!

Items

  • Tacos : Ammo
  • Hot Sauce: Speed boost
  • Banana: Slippery
  • 'Cilantro': Invincibility mode
  • Boombox: Restore motivation

name: Dr. Tacocat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.3GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670/AMD HD 7870 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 573 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Dr. Tacocat is a small skateboarding runner game set across the endless pixel crafted world of Mreowfield. Pull kickflips while collecting tacos and escaping the pug patrol.
